author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

In view of getting MB plots for TB setup, several cfg files are updated so that they work with the latest changes in geometry codes for other parts)

#### PR validation:

All changed cfg files in the area SimG4CMS/HGCalTestBeam/test are tested with acceptable results

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-TB56 Update all the cfg files of HGCal TB
